name: Drawer
desc: A Material Design panel that slides in horizontally from the edge of a [Scaffold] to show navigation links in an application.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: Sets the color of the [Material] that holds all of the [Drawer]'s contents.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this drawer relative to its parent.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The color used to paint a drop shadow under the drawer's [Material], which reflects the drawer's [elevation].

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: The color used as a surface tint overlay on the drawer's background color, which reflects the drawer's [elevation].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: semanticLabel
fields.desc: The semantic label of the drawer used by accessibility frameworks to announce screen transitions when the drawer is opened and closed.
